author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- All uses of edm::EDAnalyzer should have already been removed from CMSSW. This now removes that interface from the framework.

#### PR validation:

Framework code compiles.
release-notes: This PR is the final step in removing the support for legacy EDModules. Any code using legacy EDModule base classes outside CMSSW needs to be migrated to one of the base classes supporting multithreading. Please see documentation in https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/FWMultithreadedFrameworkModuleTypes.
title: Removed legacy EDAnalyzer interface
